title: Laze | Programming Learning That Fits You

hero_section.hero_text_description: LazeLab offers a variety of learning environments so that each student can learn programming in a way that suits them best.

1.title: Programming in your native language
1.description: LazeLab lets you write programs in a variety of languages! It brings a whole new programming learning experience that overturns the preconceived notion that English is essential for learning programming.

2.title: Intuitive editor
2.description: LazeLab comes standard with a programming beginner-friendly visual editor. Because it can be operated intuitively by drag-and-drop, even those who are not good at typing can learn without problems.

3.title: Careful tutorials
3.description: The tutorial explains the basics in detail, so even beginners who know nothing about programming can proceed with confidence. Self-checks and exercises allow you to check your understanding as you progress.

4.title: Anytime, anywhere, immediately.
4.description: LazeLab is complete on the website, so you can start learning programming immediately, regardless of time or location.
